summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, in which a Deputy U.S. Attorney instructs their team to update an 'Urgent Report on Epstein' to include information about an indictment. It indicates ongoing official activity regarding Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019.

persons.name: Deputy United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, instructing their team to update an urgent report on Jeffrey Epstein to include the indictment.

events.title: Request to Update Epstein Urgent Report
events.description: A Deputy U.S. Attorney emails their team, relaying a request from the DAG's office to update an existing 'Urgent Report on Epstein' to report the indictment.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively maintaining an 'Urgent Report on Epstein' as of July 2019.
The email confirms that an indictment against Jeffrey Epstein had been filed, necessitating an update to an official report.
The request for the update originated from the Deputy Attorney General's (DAG) office, indicating high-level oversight of the case.
